column1: share on facebookshare on twittershare on emailmore sharing services express sympathy condolences photos june jones, age 86 of jamestown, passed away on thursday, june 11, 2015 at jamestown regional medical center. funeral service will be sunday, june 14, 2015 at 2:00 pm at the jennings funeral homes chapel in jamestown. burial will follow in the taylor place cemetery. the family will receive friends on saturday, june 13, 2015 from 5:00 pm to 8:00 pm jennings funeral homes chapel in jamestown. she is survived by her: son, chester jones of jamestown a host of nieces, nephews, other family & friends she is preceded in death by her: husband-doyle jones parents-william and elizabeth (gould) hull 6 sisters-elevin bollheimer stella smith grace taubert ruth lewis elizabeth hull gladys franklin 5 brothers-cecil, cleo, hall, virden and sharon voiles in lieu of flowers, the family request donations to center belle church and they may be left at jennings funeral homes. jennings funeral homes of jamestown in charge of services for june jones of jamestown. click to send flowers using our local area florist free delivery to our funeral home & save on wire fees view/sign the condolence book. you have items in your basket. click here to review and/or checkout order directly from our recommended local area florist via our website and save on wire service fees and delivery charges to our funeral home. browse selection. bereavement productsa collection of books and bereavement products carefully designed to assist with the grieving process. browse products. click the button to generate a printable document containing all condolences submittedcondolence booklet. add condolence
